title: Aram is dead.
body:
Aram is now full of bots for level 30's to level up there smurfs and summoners that just dc.
If you ask me aram should be like Twisted treeline only on certain times not all the time.

replies.body: I had two bot games in a row a few weeks ago... wasn't fun. Luckily enough for me they were on the other team but it still got boring. In both games there were 3 bots on the one team.
or it's just people who don't know how to turn on their all chat. It took me a few matches to realize they added that option. xD
They always ran the same summoner spells in their match history, had the same build paths as their bot allies and intentionally walked up to enemies. There is a difference if you check properly.

Because the most used utility spells are escape/engage ones? Do you check their masteries at least? Team fights are usually supposed to be team fights, so allies should be following up. Tanks do that, but I haven't seen or seen much casters/dps walking up to enemies unless by mistake through mia in a bush or miss-clicking and being crowd controlled. Otherwise it might just be a noob or one of those silent trolls who don't speak until the end of the game. Please list them then! Even the ones that are ranked platinum+?
I've been playing for several years now, I can tell when it's a bot or not. You obviously haven't experienced a game with a real bot and also, it's against the board rules to list names.

Yeah, blur the names then or submit to Riot support too??? http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=414253 +screenshots http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=1396406 +recording
Feel free to say what you like but my opinion is the same as above.
They're really good bots to be ranked silver+......
I posted this on the boards when I was in bronze. I rarely ever see bots in the Aram game mode anymore.
It gets awkward when nobody talks and they all mill around in circles a lot like bees or stop poking suddenly apart from 1-2 players. I hope it's just foreign kiddies who don't know english. xP
If there really are bot's they're probably farming ip.

I know what you mean I had a game with 8 bots in it! it was just me and one other guy on the other team. 
http://postimg.org/image/60aat6oav/d5c86dd8/
I doubt there are bots ..just really weird trolls + smart cast {{champion:119}} :/
I don't understand, I've never seen a bot in an ARAM game... What's going on with ARAM that they need to have bots in it now?
A lot of Summoners are just using bots to remove bans or to level up there smurf accounts. (I play with lower level summoners who are new to the game that's why I verse like level 20ish in aram.)
I've only ever seen one bot in nearly 500 aram games.
A lot of them are happening now. if your not in a 5 man team.
